targets.query: SELECT derivative(max("primaries_indexing_index_total"), 1s) FROM "cluster_stats" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(max("primaries_indexing_index_total"), 1s) FROM "cluster_stats" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(max("primaries_indexing_index_time_in_millis"), 1s)  / primaries_indexing_index_total, derivative(max("primaries_indexing_index_total"), 1s) FROM "cluster_stats" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(max("primaries_indexing_index_time_in_millis"), 1s)  / primaries_indexing_index_total, derivative(max("primaries_indexing_index_total"), 1s) FROM "cluster_stats" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
